summary: This document is the Operating Agreement for Hyperion MR, LLC, formed by Jeffrey E. Epstein in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the structure, management, and operational guidelines of the company, including capital contributions, membership units, and the roles of the Sole Member and Manager.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Sole Member who formed Hyperion MR, LLC and is responsible for its operations and management.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Lawrence Visoski is designated as the initial Manager of Hyperion MR, LLC, responsible for managing the business and affairs of the company.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein, as the Sole Member, employs Lawrence Visoski as the Manager of the company.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, 133, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
9100 Port of Sale Mall, Suite 15, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The company Hyperion MR, LLC was formed by Jeffrey E. Epstein on October 19, 2012.
The operating agreement outlines the management structure, with Epstein as the Sole Member and Lawrence Visoski as the Manager.
The agreement specifies that capital contributions do not earn interest and cannot be withdrawn except under certain conditions.
The company is organized under the U.S. Virgin Islands Limited Liability Company Act.
The agreement includes provisions for indemnification of the Sole Member and Manager against liabilities incurred in the course of business.
